model.name: Digital Transformation Maturity Model
model.description: Assess your organization's digital transformation readiness across key dimensions including strategy, technology, operations, and culture.

dimensions.name: Strategy & Vision
dimensions.description: Strategic planning and digital vision alignment

dimensions.name: Technology & Infrastructure
dimensions.description: Digital tools, platforms, and technical capabilities

dimensions.name: Culture & People
dimensions.description: Digital mindset, skills, and organizational culture

questions.text: How well-defined is your organization's digital transformation strategy?

answers.text: No formal digital strategy exists
Strategy is being developed or discussed
Clear strategy exists but not fully implemented
Strategy is implemented across most areas
Comprehensive strategy fully embedded organization-wide

questions.text: How integrated are digital technologies into your core business operations?

answers.text: Minimal digital technology use, mostly manual processes
Some digital tools in isolated departments
Digital systems in place but limited integration
Well-integrated digital platforms across operations
Fully integrated, cloud-based ecosystem with automation

questions.text: How digitized are your core business processes?

answers.text: Primarily paper-based and manual processes
Some processes digitized, many still manual
Core processes digitized, optimization ongoing
Most processes automated with data analytics
End-to-end automation with AI/ML optimization

questions.text: How would you describe your organization's digital culture and mindset?

answers.text: Resistant to change, traditional mindset dominates
Awareness growing but limited digital adoption
Moderate digital mindset, mixed adoption levels
Strong digital culture in most teams
Innovation-driven, digital-first culture embedded

questions.text: How digitally enabled is your customer experience?

answers.text: Limited digital touchpoints, mainly offline interactions
Basic digital channels (website, email) available
Multi-channel presence with some personalization
Omnichannel experience with good personalization
Seamless, AI-powered, hyper-personalized experiences

questions.text: How data-driven is your decision-making process?

answers.text: Decisions based primarily on intuition/experience
Limited use of data for specific decisions
Regular data analysis informs key decisions
Data analytics central to most strategic decisions
AI-driven insights guide all strategic initiatives

questions.text: What is the level of digital skills within your workforce?

answers.text: Limited digital skills, significant training needed
Basic digital literacy, advanced skills rare
Growing digital capabilities, training programs in place
Strong digital skills across most of workforce
Advanced digital expertise organization-wide

questions.text: How modern and scalable is your technology infrastructure?

answers.text: Legacy systems, limited scalability
Mix of legacy and modern systems
Modernization underway, cloud adoption started
Cloud-first approach, scalable architecture
Fully cloud-native, microservices, elastic infrastructure

questions.text: How effective is your organization at innovating with digital technologies?

answers.text: Little to no digital innovation activity
Occasional innovation projects, limited success
Regular innovation initiatives with mixed results
Structured innovation process with good outcomes
Continuous innovation engine, market leadership

questions.text: How personalized and responsive is your customer engagement?

answers.text: Generic, one-size-fits-all approach
Basic segmentation, limited personalization
Segment-based personalization across channels
Individual-level personalization with predictive insights
Real-time, AI-driven hyper-personalization at scale
